query.value:
@concat(' 
DECLARE @s VARCHAR(MAX)
DECLARE @tablename VARCHAR(MAX) = ''', item().Source.TableName,'''
SELECT @s = ISNULL(@s + '', '','''') + ''['' + c.name + '']'' + '' as ['' + replace(c.name,'' '',''_'') + ''] ''
FROM information_schema.columns c 
WHERE table_name = @tablename
SELECT ''SELECT '' + @s + '' FROM ['' +  @tablename + '']', if(greater(length(item().Increment.IdField),1),concat(' ORDER BY ', item().Increment.IdField, ' DESC'),''), if(greater(length(pipeline().parameters.LimitedLoadTopX),1),concat(' LIMIT ', pipeline().parameters.LimitedLoadTopX),''),''' as Query')
